programme.title: Gadis Penjual Takjil Yang Sukses Karena Ikhlas Merawat Nenek Tirinya
programme.desc: Setiap bulan Ramadan, Kemala sentiasa datang membantu nenek tirinya menjual takjil. Nenek selalu memberi upah kepada Kemala selepas habis berniaga. Tetapi upah yang diterimanya pasti diminta oleh ibu tirinya.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep380
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Bintang Pantura 6 Ep21
programme.desc: Bintang Pantura 6 kini kembali! Juragan Soimah ditemani oleh Nunung (Pembantu Juragan) dan Inul Daratista (Rakan Perniagaan Juragan) akan mencari 40 peserta untuk bertanding di pentas impian. Bersama mentor: Nassar, Via Vallen, Dewi Perssik, Jenita Janet, Happy Asmara dan para Konco Pantura.

programme.title: Cinta Suci Ep296
programme.desc: Suci yang terjerat dalam masalah harus bernikah dengan Marcel kerana dia sangat memerlukan wang untuk menguruskan suami dan anaknya, iaitu Aditya dan Ronny agar mereka berdua dapat meneruskan hidup. Manakala, Monica membenci Suci kerana dia menganggap bahawa Suci telah memaksa Marcel mengahwininya.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep12
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Berkah Gadis Penjual Jambu Kristal Yang Bertekad Menyembuhkan Penyakit Kakaknya
programme.desc: Karisa merupakan seorang penjual jambu kristal yang berniaga untuk membiayai kos perubatan kakaknya, Najwa.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep31
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep20
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jleb Ep10
programme.desc: Jleb! (Jebakan Seleb) adalah rancangan realiti yang berkonsepkan 'prank', dimana artis itu membuat 'prank' kepada artis lain. Jangan lepaskan keseronokan menyaksikan reaksi artis yang tiada kesudahan ketika mereka saling 'prank' sesama sendiri oleh Joe Richard dan pasukan Jleb.

programme.title: Tak Ada Gebetan Mantanpun Jadi
programme.desc: Sonia sangat marah kerana ketika dia menjalin hubungan dengan orang yang diminatinya, tiba-tiba Rizk, bekas kekasihnya, menganiaya Sonia. Sudah tentu Sonia hanya mengesyaki bahawa Rizki cemburu padanya. Adakah Rizki hanya cemburu atau adakah dia benar-benar mahu menyedarkan Sonia?

programme.title: Cinta Suci Ep296
programme.desc: Suci yang terjerat dalam masalah harus bernikah dengan Marcel kerana dia sangat memerlukan wang untuk menguruskan suami dan anaknya, iaitu Aditya dan Ronny agar mereka berdua dapat meneruskan hidup. Manakala, Monica membenci Suci kerana dia menganggap bahawa Suci telah memaksa Marcel mengahwininya.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep20
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep31
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Bintang Pantura 6 Ep22
programme.desc: Bintang Pantura 6 kini kembali! Juragan Soimah ditemani oleh Nunung (Pembantu Juragan) dan Inul Daratista (Rakan Perniagaan Juragan) akan mencari 40 peserta untuk bertanding di pentas impian. Bersama mentor: Nassar, Via Vallen, Dewi Perssik, Jenita Janet, Happy Asmara dan para Konco Pantura.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep34
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Toping Cinta Mba Bubur Ayam Unstoppable
programme.desc: Nada, si penjual bubur pada mulanya ingin mengahwini Rio. Tetapi kenapa dia mengahwini kembar Rio pula?

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep32
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.desc: Nada, si penjual bubur pada mulanya ingin mengahwini Rio. Tetapi kenapa dia mengahwini kembar Rio pula?

programme.title: Wah Gak Nyangka Bakal Serame Ini
programme.desc: Terkenal sombong dan terlalu selektif dalam memilih teman lelaki, Belle menjadi bahan ejekan di majlis perkahwinan rakannya sehingga dia berang lalu diusir. Kerana kejadian itu agak menggemparkan, dia terpaksa menuruti bapanya untuk melarikan diri ke kampung halamannya. Setibanya di destinasi, Belle sudah pun terlibat dengan masalah baru yang memaksa dia berpura-pura menjadi tunangan Arya.

programme.title: Gadis Penjual Takjil Yang Sukses Karena Ikhlas Merawat Nenek Tirinya
programme.desc: Setiap bulan Ramadan, Kemala sentiasa datang membantu nenek tirinya menjual takjil. Nenek selalu memberi upah kepada Kemala selepas habis berniaga. Tetapi upah yang diterimanya pasti diminta oleh ibu tirinya.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep32
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep376
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Melupakanmu Tak Seindah Mengenalmu
programme.desc: Jatuh cinta semasa sekolah menengah adalah perkara paling indah yang boleh berlaku kepada seseorang. Ia memberikan kenangan terbaik dan pengalaman yang tidak dapat dilupakan. Bagaimanapun, selepas enam tahun bersama, Bagas & Ratih memutuskan hubungan mereka kerana konflik keluarga. Bolehkah cinta sejati mereka menyatukan mereka?

programme.title: Wonde2ful 7ourney Ep2
programme.desc: Kemuncak sambutan Indosiar ke-27 dimulakan dengan pentas hebat “Wonde2ful 7ourney”! Dengan penampilan spesial dari deretan bintang di satu panggung megah: Iwan Fals, Lesti, Rizky Billar, Elvy Sukaesih, Inul Daratista, Dewi Perssik, Via Vallen, Happy Asmara, JKT 48, The Sacred Riana, Valentino “Jebreet” Simanjuntak, Maria Vania! Penampilan eksklusif dari "27 Wonderful Voices", LIDA-DA & 7 Penyanyi Viral dan banyak lagi!

programme.title: A Violent Prosecutor
programme.desc: After a prosecution lawyer is framed and convicted for murder, he tries to catch the real murderer from jail with the help of a con artist.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail

programme.title: Innocence

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep751752
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44674468
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep22
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep3031
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep415
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep12
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1022
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep22
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep3031
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep415
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep12
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1022
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep22
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep22
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1022
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep736
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep740741
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep638
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep416
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Piggy's Counter-Attack (M) Ep3839
programme.desc: A rich father, who built his fortune from nothing, goes bankrupt overnight when his investments fail. His children are knocked out of heaven and have to launch a counterattack.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a housewife living with her family. When a stranger uses her dark history to blackmail her, Mrs K is forced to face an old enemy to save her family.

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idol’s memory.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: After “Golden Chickenesss”, this is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Angela arrives from another planet in search of her brother, fate has her unexpectedly meet handsome veterinarian Tian Yi, who risks himself to save her every time she gets into trouble. Though she is no believer of love, his actions eventually move her…

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: With Prisoners
programme.desc: Fan is a young gang member who was sentenced to 3 months at a juvenile detention centre. He survives the ordeal and is given hope to see his grandmother before she passes. By submitting to the guards’ abuse, Fan earns his right to be released in record time, only to witness the mysterious death of his cellmate days before his own release.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: God of War
programme.desc: During the 16th century, pirates rule the Chinese coastline, pillaging the small villages and terrorizing the citizens. When maverick leader Commander Yu (martial arts legend Sammo Hung) enlists the help of a sharp young general (Vincent Zhao), they devise a plan to defeat the pirates.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company which all staffs are women. Unfortunately, he is clueless with women so he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love Mona.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kit’s master, Debo.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Scientist Xia Tian's hard work finally pays off when she successfully sends living tissue back through time by 110 minutes. When her son dies at the hands of kidnappers, she sends herself back through time on a frantic mission to prevent his death.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Ah Fatt and Tin Ba are the top disciples of the mahjong maestro. After winning the first “King of Mahjong” title, Fatt retires to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Although Ba subsequently wins the next ten titles, he cannot get over the fact that Fatt beats him and challenges Fatt for a final showdown in the first Mahjong World Championship.

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter (Ti Lung) relives his violent past mistakes through a poverty-striken, streetwise kid, who severely injuries his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Legend of the Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A thief and a constable team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. They are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70’s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister’s magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and you’ve got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain (Wang Lung-wei), and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and you’ve got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: Till The End Of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: Chief of Wu Tang, Ching Chung (Wang Jung) is beaten and wounded by Head of Wu Ti, Tu Ku (Alex Man Chi-leung) in a 10-yearly duel between these remaining two thriving clans. Tu Ku offers to duel with Ching Chung again in two years, hoping to counter his rival clan's Silkworm Skill. Ching Chung's pupilFu Yu-shu (Liu Yung), finds Yun (Hsu Shao-chiang) to be Ching-chung's illegitimate child, and kills Ching-chung, to frame Yun. He then proclaims himself the new Wu Tang Chief and orders the killing of Yun. Meanwhile, Yun learns Silkworm Skill and finally become a No.1 martial artist, she purges the Wu Tang clan and kills Fu to avenge her father's death.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: New Tales Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head’s son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband’s playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called “The Venoms”, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobra’s blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his father’s old rival.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor (The Chinese Boxer) and action choreographer (Jackie Chan's Drunken Master), the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan (Once Upon A Time In China) and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li (Snake In The Eagle's Shadow) everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a mortician's ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Buddha'S Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddha's Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents’ kung fu styles.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat’s knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit…

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: In a bid to escape from Viji's antics, his neighbours lure him to fall in love with Maya. However, everything turns upside down when he realises that a ghost is protecting Maya.

programme.title: A1 Express
programme.desc: A former player finds a renewed sense of purpose when he returns to the hockey field.

programme.title: Lokpal
programme.desc: Nandagopal, a chef, becomes the saviour of people in distress and fights against corruption. He has an unnerving past that explains his current state of mind.

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Bhaskar, a single parent, is labelled rascal because of his impolite behaviour. His son, Akash, decides to set him up with Anu, whose daughter is Akash's classmate.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Sethupathy
programme.desc: Sethupathi, a tough police officer, investigates the murder of an inspector. His findings lead to the arrest of Vathiyar, an influential man in Madurai, but put his life, career and family at risk.

programme.title: Killadi Marumagan
programme.desc: The son of an egoistic businessman falls in love with an egoistic girl and has to convince her egoistic mother in order to marry her.

programme.title: Aghavan
programme.desc: A police officer works undercover in Brihadeeswarar Temple in Thanjavur to protect its treasure from criminals who plan to loot the temple.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Wild Dog
programme.desc: A series of deadly attacks occur that pose a threat to national security. In response, a brash but brilliant intelligence agent leads a covert operation to find the perpetrators.

programme.title: Idhu Ennoda Jilla
programme.desc: Veera loses his father in a village fight arising out of a long-standing rivalry. Can he avenge his father's death and put an end to the violence?

programme.title: Blood Money
programme.desc: 2 brothers from India working in Kuwait are sentenced to death penalty for killing an srilankan women. Day before there hanging the news breakout in an Indian news channel by a lady reporter.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Nenjam Marapadhillai
programme.desc: A god-fearing young woman who takes up the job of a caretaker in a rich household tries to take revenge on her lustful employer.

programme.title: Kanaa
programme.desc: A woman who hails from a middle-class family background aims to excel in the competitive world of cricket with the help of her supportive father.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a skull is found in a package, ACP Sathyajith gets tasked with identifying the victim and finding the killer. Parallelly, a journalist, who gets haunted by a spirit, investigates the mystery.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Thondan
programme.desc: Narayanan, a politician's son, assaults Vishnu when his brother dies in his ambulance. Later, he makes Vishnu's life miserable by bribing the local police officers and government officials.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee
programme.desc: A group of teenagers studying in a strict Catholic school in the 1990s learn how to navigate through the challenges of school life and adolescence.

programme.title: Kuttram 23
programme.desc: ACP Vetrimaaran unravels a crime racket involving medical professionals. However, his task becomes harder every day as the case becomes murkier and complex.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: The home minister requests Ravi to impersonate the deceased ACP Baldev, his lookalike, to catch Ganguly, a dreaded gangster. After taking over his new role, Ravi finds many startling revelations.

programme.title: Singh Saab The Great

programme.title: Mental

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Garam

programme.title: Abhimanyu
programme.desc: Abhimanyu, a professional computer engineer, puts his life at risk and fights for people from poverty-stricken areas so that they receive an education.

programme.title: One By Two

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: Jai, a multimillionaire, is secretly in love with Tia whose husband he kills unintentionally while driving. After she loses her memory in the accident, she eventually falls for a guilt-ridden Jai.

programme.title: Athiratha

programme.title: Shaandaar

programme.title: The Fighter Mard No. 1
programme.desc: An honest police officer, Prabhakaran, puts a notorious gangster, Easwaramoorthy, behind bars. When Easwaramoorthy learns of his identity, he decides to take revenge by targeting Prabhakaran's sister.

programme.title: What The Fish
programme.desc: Sudha hands over the responsibility of her house and pet fish to her niece's fiance before leaving for a holiday. When she returns, all seems fine until she opens the bathroom door.

programme.title: Fauladi Policewala
programme.desc: Ibrahim, a police inspector, gets posted in a village with a very low crime rate. In pursuit of an adventurous life, he plans to obtain a transfer with the help of local thugs, but his plan backfires.

programme.title: I Am 24
programme.desc: Hilarity ensues when a middle-aged man falls in love with a younger woman and tries to woo her by pretending to be a younger man.

programme.title: Deedar
programme.desc: Anand and Sapna fall in love and want to get married. However, their love is threatened when his father's past misdeeds are revealed and Sapna parts ways with him.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: Cady Heron is a cultural blank slate when she first sets foot on the grounds of North Shore High School in a small town outside of Chicago, Illinois. After living in Africa, Cady has no idea how "wild" things can be in civilization until she crosses paths with one of the meanest species of all, the "Queen Bee," who at this school is the cool and calculating Regina George. But Cady doesn't just cross paths with this Queen Bee--she really stings her when she falls for Regina's ex-boyfriend Aaron Samuels. Now Regina is set to sting back by pretending to still like Aaron so he won't go out with Cady, all the while pretending to be her friend. With no choice but to use the same M.O. to stay in the game, the "Girl World" one-upmanship escalates until the entire school gets dragged into a first-class mean-fest.

programme.title: Les Miserables
programme.desc: A sweeping epic of love, honor and obsession played out against the tumultuous backdrop of early 19th century France.

programme.title: Ronin

programme.title: All The President's Men
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Robert Redford and Dustin Hoffman star in this true story as Washington Post reporters Carl Bernstein and Bob Woodward, whose investigation of a seemingly minor hotel room break-in uncovers the greatest political scandal in United States history and leads to the downfall of President Richard Nixon.

programme.title: Gemini Man

programme.title: A Month By The Lake

programme.title: Duplex

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me
programme.desc: An ex-con drifter develops an unlikely friendship with a wealthy Dallas art dealer.

programme.desc: The story of an intelligent, heroic collie and his young owner, previously featured in numerous films and a successful 1950s television series, was updated for the 1990s in this family feature.

programme.title: FBI (S2) Ep12

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Carrier - NCIS Special Agent Tony DiNozzo assists the New Orleans team when a Navy lieutenant on liberty dies of the bubonic plague.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: A former Russian spy selling international intelligence on the black market, and a spy agency ready to disavow the actions or existence of any of its members captured or killed.

programme.title: A Summer in Southern France
programme.desc: Charlotte has inherited half of her uncle’s funeral home in Provence. She wants to sell it for profit but Andre, the other stakeholder, wants to continue the family business. They butt heads ferociously – but with great hate comes great love

programme.title: Out Of Paradise
programme.desc: Dorj and Suren’s idyllic nomadic life on the Mongolian Steppe is shaken as Suren develops complications in her pregnancy. They embark on a heartwarming journey to the capital, Ulaanbaatar, to seek medical treatment, and overcome challenges along the way.

programme.title: Let Me Go
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Helga Schenider’s mother joined the Nazi SS in 1941 and abandoned her little daughter. In 2000, Helga’s family located her in a nursing home but the trauma and scars of the cruel past return to haunt the three generations of women.

programme.title: Italian Gigolo
programme.desc: Filippo is the hottest male escort. Incredibly sexy, he makes up in looks for what he lacks in wits. When an accident causes him to undergo plastic surgery, he wakes up to find himself in a new body, with a new face and a new kind of beauty.

programme.title: Omamamia
programme.desc: In this feel-good, multi-generational comedy, its protagonists take on life’s vicissitudes with witty charm. Grandma Marguerita journeys to Rome to see the pope, and along the way, she picks up her rocker granddaughter Martina and conman Lorenzo.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Murders in Hossegor
programme.desc: Local VIP Juliette is found killed in the same way as a falsely accused shepherdess who died 600 years ago. The police struggle to find a link between the modern murder and an archaic legend – but the devil is in the details of Juliette’s personal life.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: International Falls
programme.desc: Dee is a middle-aged mother of two who is stuck in a Midwest rut. While on vacation, she meets Tim, a washed-up stand-up comedian, and an unlikely bond develops. Together, they find the silver lining in their gloomy lives.

programme.title: A Summer in Southern France

programme.title: You Can't Tame A Rockstar
programme.desc: For true love, John Winter, a popular rock star, decides to forgo sex and drugs for a new ‘vanilla’ lifestyle. Worried about his image, John’s manager orders his assistant Lou to make John wild again. But the mission goes awry when Lou falls for John.

programme.title: Murders in Hossegor

programme.title: The Penguin Move
programme.desc: In this rib-tickling inspirational film, Bruno is a thirty year-old new father but he still feels unfulfilled. That is until he discovers the sport of curling and decides to take on the audacious goal of forming a team to participate in the Olympics.

programme.title: Hacker

programme.title: The Daddy Offensive
programme.desc: Markus, who has always wanted a family, is overjoyed when his holiday fling Lena becomes pregnant. Her father strongly disapproves of him and when he turns up for his birthday, a hilarious showdown ensues between Markus and his future father-in-law.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: A teenager’s web of lies blows up in her face and threatens to destroy the lives of her older sister and mother. As the two siblings desperately try to clean up her mess, they find out the truth about their mother.

programme.title: Thirst
programme.desc: On a hilltop in Bulgaria plagued by drought, a couple and their teenage son eke out a living doing laundry for local hotels. The arrival of a well-digger and his daughter promises not only to quench their thirst for water, but for something far stronger.

programme.title: Thirst

programme.title: The Best Of Dorien B.

programme.title: Karnaval

programme.desc: An ecocritical film that explores capitalistic greed and environmental destruction. A young civil servant, Jussi, is in charge of the environmental permit of a huge mine. He soon discovers dangerous truths about its operations but his job is on the line.

programme.title: Life As We Know It
programme.desc: Life As We Know It Grey's Anatomy's Katherine Heigl and Transformers' Josh Duhamel play polar opposites Holly and Eric. After a disastrous first date, the only thing they have in common is their dislike for each other and their love for their goddaughter, Sophie. But when they suddenly become all Sophie has in the world, they are forced to put their differences aside. Juggling career ambitions and competing social calendars, they'll have to find some common ground while living under one roof-- and deal with life as we know it. Directed by Greg Berlanti (Brothers and Sisters, Dawson's Creek), this romantic drama also features Mad Men's Christina Hendricks and more.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep170
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Chucky Ep7
programme.desc: Twice The Grieving, Double The Loss - As Hackensack reels from Chucky's relentless but secret reign of terror, the Mayor tries to allay fears by cluelessly arresting an innocent suspect.

programme.desc: He Made Me Do It / New York Nights / The Passenger - A call devolves into ghostly encounter between a Guard and a spirit. Paramedic Malcolm gets called to a decrepit apartment building. Trisha is left dumbfounded when her ambulance’s lighting system goes on the fritz.

programme.desc: Demon Teen / Dark Shadows / Paranormal Plaza - A father calls 911 about his daughter’s weird behavior. Officer Scott is called to an attempted robbery, and finds an elderly man being tormented. The Police receive a call that there is a bomb left in a mall.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep11

programme.desc: Portal Peril / Full Moon Fever - Officer Joe responds to a 911 call about strange activity taking place in a residential home. Firefighter/EMT Ting Rappa responds to two alarms at the same amusement park.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep2
programme.desc: Skirting The Border - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities; tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep3

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep4
programme.desc: China’s Northernmost Point - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 learn how Mongolians cook goats in their own skins, get serenaded by locals on the China/Russian border, and finally complete their journey at China’s northernmost point.

programme.desc: See the secrets of the ice cream served like a cake, or the production of tangy tartar sauce, and a machine called the "encruster" that makes a single batch of 2,700 bite-size cake pops.

programme.desc: A look at ready-to-blend fruit smoothies, and turning raw organic cocoa beans into chocolate bars. Plus the production of delicious paneer, and the story behind wasabi.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: We visit an extraordinary bridge that spans a vast valley and becomes the tallest in the world, and a luxury hotel was built upside down in an abandoned quarry in China.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep2

programme.title: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing Our Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Protect and Restore Nature - Prince William, founder of the Earthshot Prize, is joined by Sir David Attenborough, a member of his Earthshot Prize Council, to explore how we may best protect and restore nature. Sir David explains exactly what aspect of our approach to modern life is causing a global decline in biodiversity, and how damaging this decline will be to our own lives. But, he reveals, we know how to halt and reverse the loss of wildlife.

programme.title: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing Our Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Protect and Restore Nature - Prince William, founder of the Earthshot Prize, is joined by Sir David Attenborough, a member of his Earthshot Prize Council, to explore how we may best protect and restore nature. Sir David explains exactly what aspect of our approach to modern life is causing a global decline in biodiversity, and how damaging this decline will be to our own lives. But, he reveals, we know how to halt and reverse the loss of wildlife.

programme.title: The Ganges with Sue Perkins S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Gangetic Plain - The Gangetic Plain is where the ancient and modern collide - from the sacred city of Varanasi to Patna, a city fast becoming India's Silicon Valley. It's here also that the Ganges faces its greatest threats from dams, pollution, industry and agriculture.

programme.desc: Iceland - Ben journeys to the freezing coastal waters of Iceland to live with Hakon, a former carpenter who overcame alcohol and embraced a clean, solo life in the wilderness on an private island.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the region’s species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South Africa Ep11
programme.desc: Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Capybara's Pond Ep7
programme.desc: At the northern edge of the Pantanal, in one of the largest tropical wetlands on Earth, is a small pond that is home to an unusual family of rodents. They are not your typical rats or squirrels - these giants are the size of sheep! And in the middle of the dry season, this group has more than a dozen babies to raise and keep safe. It is a challenge because as big as they are, these gentle giants are on the menu of lots of predators.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Ngorongoro Ep3
programme.desc: Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 - Vancouver Island Ep6
programme.desc: Journey to the wild Pacific coast on the western shore of Vancouver Island in British Columbia. From the peaks of mountain glaciers to the canopies of Canada’s only rainforest, nature and human spirit coexist in spectacular habitats.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Sub Sahara Ep12
programme.desc: The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors. Male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is eerily familiar.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Ngorongoro Ep3
programme.desc: Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - City Ep6
programme.desc: It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Highlands Ep7
programme.desc: Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting – but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Change in the Air Ep3
programme.desc: Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Hunkering Down Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - The Domino Effect Ep1
programme.desc: Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, it’s their last day at forest school.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Dilla’s Surprise Ep2
programme.desc: Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Kesi Turns a Corner Ep3
programme.desc: Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Bears on the Move Ep4
programme.desc: Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Wine’s New Friend Ep5
programme.desc: Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - City Ep6
programme.desc: It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Kesi Turns a Corner Ep3
programme.desc: Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Wine’s New Friend Ep5
programme.desc: Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon Ep10
programme.desc: In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Invasion Ep11
programme.desc: Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. It’s turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Christmas Island Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Fraser Island Ep4
programme.desc: Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chico the Baby Capuchin Ep4
programme.desc: In Brazil’s Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - The Woodland Troop Ep1
programme.desc: In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbors are allies, and which are foes. Who to trust, and who to avoid. They will suffer loss, and gain friends, as they discover what it means to be part of the Woodland Troop.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Better Together Ep2
programme.desc: The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Safari CSI Ep3
programme.desc: Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Africa's Edens Ep4
programme.desc: Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon Ep10
programme.desc: In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - The Woodland Troop Ep1
programme.desc: In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbors are allies, and which are foes. Who to trust, and who to avoid. They will suffer loss, and gain friends, as they discover what it means to be part of the Woodland Troop.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Better Together Ep2
programme.desc: The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Safari CSI Ep3
programme.desc: Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Africa's Edens Ep4
programme.desc: Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.
