programme.title: The Show
programme.desc: A weekly variety music show from Korea's SBS Prism Tower, showcasing some of the biggest names in K-Pop, where viewers vote for The Show Choice winner and results are announced weekly.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep39
programme.desc: Magnet Mountain - Revvithelps Ty unlock his ultimate power to rescue all their friends trapped inside a magnetized mountain by D-Structs, Splitter, Blayde and Pounde

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep39
programme.desc: A Thuper Hero Thtory - Tip and Oh's plan to save Elrod turns into a battle to save earth from Elrod

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep25
programme.desc: Cleo & Zaid - Cleo and Zaid finally find the Uta Tablet, but the people guarding it want Cleo to stay and be their Queen. Which, like, is definitely not the worst offer she's ever gotten.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep20
programme.desc: Zoo-Lander / Balloonatics - Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce.//Whiplash attempts to keep the crew from meeting his parents.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Dang, I'M Rich! / Power Play - Cousin Ashley sets out to strike it rich and buy himself a mansion. Archibald explores Crackridge during a blackout with a new pal.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Postcards From The Veg - Pieface laments that Paul is looking peaky and needs a holiday. Dennis has a plan! But its only when Walter kidnaps Paul that he realises his chips are down and he needs to get the gangs help to put things right!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Whole Tooth - Gnasher gnashes Walters portrait so he retaliates with a titanium sausage leaving Gnasher toothless, miserable and without his mojo! Dennis and the gang will have to stage a heist to 'borrow' some diamonds until Gnasher's teeth grow back!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep65
programme.desc: A Savage Place - After winning the trust of the Zephilim, Puss storms the Blind King's castle in hopes of saving his friends, restoring the true ruler of the Netherworld, and blocking the Portal for good

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep13
programme.desc: Crimson And Clover - Clover's wild, party-girl twin sister Crimson visits and King Julien is instantly smitten.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep75
programme.desc: Race To The Finish Part 2 - Determined to save her family home, Lucky signs up to race as a wild card in Rosemead's elite Junior Cup. But winning it all won't be easy.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Troublesome Treachery Of The Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee’s Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End Of The Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep65
programme.desc: Sins Of The Past - After Heather is lured to the Northern Markets as a trap, Hiccup flies to find her, but when he arrives too late, Windshear is captured by Krogan

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math/Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Wizards: Tales Of Arcadia Ep3
programme.desc: Witch Hunt - With the future at stake, Douxie and Claire cling to the hope that Arthur and Morgana can reconcile. Meanwhile, humans are hunting trolls in the woods.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep65
programme.desc: A Savage Place - After winning the trust of the Zephilim, Puss storms the Blind King's castle in hopes of saving his friends, restoring the true ruler of the Netherworld, and blocking the Portal for good

Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Scare Bud / All Harvey'S Eve - There's an uninvited guest at the Bow's house: a not-so-scary ghost named Casper. On Halloween, Lotta tries to win a spooky storytelling contest.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Rupert & The Scarecrow - Rupert and the others meet a sad little scarecrow who's lonely and upset that the crows don't come near him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rupert & The Octopus’S Garden - Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep21
programme.desc: Bad Company - Circumstantial evidence has Birch certain Raffi's fallen in with a bad crowd. His frequent absences, new friends and secretive behaviour point to one thing for Birch who has a hard time convincing her friends. A note, its content misconstrued, finally convinces everyone of Raffi's dire predicament.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep22
programme.desc: Manga Slam - An attempt to quell Liam's manic energy throws Birch into conflict. Does she continue helping her hyperactive cousin learn to relax or does she pull him into the school's Manga Slam? Will Liam become too relaxed or bring a never-before-seen energy to Cosmos High's stage?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet'S Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep21
programme.desc: The Wrong Man-Ace - Dennis is mistaken for a Beanotown Baddie while in disguise to sneak into 12A film. At first Dennis loves being treated like a celebrity, but as things begin to go awry his friends have to save him by revealing his real identity and capturing the true diamond stealing baddie!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Red And Black To The Future - When Dennis comes across Professor Screwtop’s time machine in his lab, then uses it without reading the instructions he starts a chain of events that lead 2 Gnashersaurus Rex's rampaging through Beanotown! How is Dennis going to set things right without bumping into other versions of himself and destroying the space time continuum!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep11
programme.desc: Crystal Venom - The Castle of Lions mysteriously turns against the Paladins, forcing Princess Allura to make a difficult sacrifice to save Team Voltron.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep39
programme.desc: Return Of The Guapos Part 1 / Lucy Walker - When Peabody and Sherman's audience goes missing, they discover the Guapo Bros are hosting a rival late-night show in a Penthouse across the street

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep37
programme.desc: Shockarachnids - Dozer and Skya work together to find their way home after they are attacked by Shockarachnids, jumper-cable-like snakes with high-voltage bites

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep51
programme.desc: Turbo Does Laundry Part 1/Part 2 - An exciting two-part episode of connected mini-stories following the crew that ends with Silent But Deadly and Thora deactivating a stink bomb.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Get Lost - The gang get lost in the woods and stumble into a Land of Lost Things, where Gnasher gets “dognapped” by a Gnashersaurus Rex which has lost its beloved egg. To save Gnasher they have to rely on “Pieface Logic” to reunite the G-Rex with its egg, and thwart Walter’s ambition to make a record-breaking giant omelette...

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Call Of The Wild - Gnasher gets sent to Dog Obedience School after he inexplicably gnashes Mrs Creecher’s saxophone. When a Screwtop invention gives Dennis the ability to understand animals, he’s convinced the “Chatterbox” is Gnasher’s key to freedom. But all the talkative animals of Beanotown interrupt Dennis’ mission to speak to Gnasher and find out the truth...

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep17
programme.desc: Big Brain Boov / Pook Pooks - When Tip can't solve a homework problem, Oh takes them to the Big Brain Boov; Oh feels he can't "Pook Pook" in front of Tip, creating a gross mix-up.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep23
programme.desc: Three Trolls-Keteers / The Helper - When a neighbor asks Guy for help to fight a monster, Guy mistakes it as an invite to act in his play/Smidge sets out to help Troll Village but creates disastrous results

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep24
programme.desc: Smidgician / Dj'S Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep49
programme.desc: Small Change - When Puss feels powerless against the threat of the Bloodwolf, the crew asks Callista to help find the mysterious location of the Obelisk of Night

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep50
programme.desc: Little Lamb - When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep49

programme.desc: Koto, Plain And Tall - Julien is lost in the jungle and accidentally saves a Mountain Lemur named Koto who turns out to be the biggest threat the kingdom has ever faced

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep23

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep50

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep24
programme.desc: Breakers / A Day Without Tech - To save their family vacation, the Tucci's must “out-party” the hard-partying Breakers; When Boov-tech stops working, Oh goes off the grid.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep23
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Two - When a mysterious goop gives Fearless Leader real life superpowers, Rocky and Bullwinkle must reprise their masked hero personas.

programme.desc: Harvily Ever After / Let It Zo - Lucretia's wrapping up her Harvey Girls fan fiction podcast, but it's hard to say goodbye. Zoe's convinced that Audrey stole her bananarama baton.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Rupert & The Treasure Chest - An old Pirate tells Rupert he is searching for the treasure that will raise his sunken ship from the depths. How can Rupert help him?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Rupert & The Magic Show - When Ping Pong's glow-worm trick goes wrong, it's her rival Bill who ends up helping out… with spectacular results.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep23
programme.desc: They'Re Watching Us - After Birch watches a late night mockumentary on TV about aliens among us, she becomes a big ball of paranoia as she misinterprets her schoolmates' head twitches, hand gestures and overall comportment. What she doesn't know is they're planning a surprise party for her and are acting all mysterious around her.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep24
programme.desc: The Mascot - Liam is asked to help out the soccer team when an injury sidelines Raffi. Immediately thrilled to be part of the team — any team — Liam's joy turns to humiliation when he realizes the other players want him to be the mascot, not an actual player.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep76
programme.desc: Inspector Stingo - Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Pig Trouble In Little Beanotown - When poor Gnasher is laid up wearing the 'collar of shame' Dennis takes Rasher to school instead and disguises her as an exchange student! What Dennis doesn't expect is that Walter will take a shine to the new girl! But once Walter realises the object of his affections is Rasher he is beyond embarrassed and hatches a revenge plan!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: I, Clawdia - I, Clawdia Walter and Clawdia are causing mischief for the gang by framing Gnasher for chewing things he shouldn't! It's only when the mayhem gets out of hand that Dennis smells a rat, or rather a cat! Dennis must catch Clawdia in the act and prove Gnasher's innocence before it's too late!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat-Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit-Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals-It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Bicycle-Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Ukulele-Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Our New Neighbor!-Josh and Blue have some BIG news--a new neighbor just moved in next door... it's Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer-After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol-Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Coral Dilemma-When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly-When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast-The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair-It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Blackberry Treasure-Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Knight Riders-Blaze and Crusher discover a medieval kingdom holding a Royal Race! They become knights to compete in the race across the realm. Even though Sir Blaze the Fast is the speediest knight of all, Crusher's medieval cheats won't make it easy to win.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Darington to the Moon!-Today Darington will attempt his biggest stunt yet: rocketing to the moon! But his battery-powered rocket is out of energy. To get to the moon, Blaze must help Darington recharge his battery with all the energy they can find.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things-Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Coral Dilemma-When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Come to Your Senses!-Oh no! Nonny broke his glasses! When they're fixed, Nonny is determined to retrieve them on his own. But to do it, he'll have to depend on his other four senses to reach the glasses store before it closes!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Puddleball!-When rain spoils a game of kickball, Gil invents a new game that shows how fun a little rain can be. But when the weather turns too wet, even for puddleball, Bubble Puppy must overcome his fear of thunder to save the game!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair-The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Numbers-Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road-Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox-Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep131
programme.desc: The Box of Secrets-Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Bubu's Robot-Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Marvelous Moustaches-Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up-Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Getting Glasses with Magenta-It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her to meet.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Runaway Rocket-When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket! Now it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue the two trucks before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster-Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks it’s a “snow monster” and it’s scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do-Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster – Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodway’s purse chicken “Chickaletta” has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Doctor Steel Little / Astonished And Amazed-Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Dance Of Destruction-A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler-Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef-Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital-Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Spring-Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter-Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander-Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep603
programme.desc: A Giant Harvest Day!-Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil, on a mission to save the town's Harvest Day (Thanksgiving) feast, must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Blue-It's Blue's birthday! We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what present Blue wants for her birthday. While we look for Clues, we help Josh get ready for the party by observing patterns & take a trip to Joe's Present Store.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Playdate with Magenta-Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta. During our search for clues, we identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel & Pail.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue!-When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove-Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Coral Dilemma-When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Pups Save the Diving Bell / Pups Save the Beavers-While the Turbots are deep sea diving, their diving bell ends up stuck! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A storm washes away a beaver's dam, so he chomps all the wood at Farmer Yumi's! The PAW Patrol arrives to help rebuild his home!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap-Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story-Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out-Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show-Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save a Playful Dragon / Pups Save the Critters-Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. // Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepover / Pups Save the Carnival-Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride-Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save the Flying Food / Pups Save a Ferris Wheel-Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep625
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Opening Ceremonies / Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Adventure Bay Games-Marshall leads the pups when an underground fire threatens the Opening Ceremonies in this Ultimate Fire Rescue. // Chase and his police-pups must find the missing medals to save the Adventure Bay Games in this Ultimate Police Rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep712

programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepwalking Bear / Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny-The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up. // Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.desc: Pups Save Big Hairy / Pups Save a Flying Kitty-Pups need to lure a big ape onto the PAW Patroller so they can take him back to the jungle. // Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty / Pups Save a Cloud Surfer - Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles / Pups Save the Shivering Sheep - Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. // Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.desc: Pups Save Luke Stars - Katie is going to perform her contest winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Pups Save Francois the Penguin / Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo - Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save a Playful Dragon / Pups Save the Critters - Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. // Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepover / Pups Save the Carnival - Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save the Flying Food / Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Moon - Dee encourages a friend to say 'moon' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! Before we say good night to the moon, we see a bright moon, a light moon and even a tickly moon!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep59
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When an erupting geyser disturbs the rabbits, the team helps them to find a more peaceful home.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: It's time for a sleepover - JoJo has a sleepover at Gran Gran's but is confused when bedtime comes while it's still light outside! Gran Gran creates their own starry sky for JoJo.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: Follow the Leader - The Kazoops struggle to work as a team when building their new table tennis table.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Piggy Blues - Monty discovers Jimmy Jones is sad and tries to cheer him up, but wonders why everyone can't be happy all the time.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: Teasing - Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep19
programme.desc: The Art Badge - The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it, while preparing their own pieces for Tino the artistic mouse's Woodland Biennale.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep18
programme.desc: The History Badge - The Squirrels get a very interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces from the past!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep17
programme.desc: The Sharing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between everyone equally.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Machu Picchu, Peru - A giant grimbot bounces down the valley of Machu Picchu. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Artificial Reef - Xuli finds a shipwreck on a coral reef and learns some glitches don't need to be fixed.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: Neighbours - Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Chickenrat - It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Ophtalmosaurus & Painting - Andy plunges into an underwater prehistoric adventure in search of a giant swimming reptile the size of an elephant. However, after being chased by a shark, he finds himself lost at sea.

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Tall Machines - Rally driver Catie shows off three amazing machines that are all really tall! She goes up in a cherry picker, shows us skyscraper-building tower cranes and then drives a crawler crane.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep12
programme.desc: The Big Fall Out - Hermione, Maaria, Harrison and Josh are the Swashbucklers aiming to win back all Gem's jewels and earn the right to see one of the pirates walk the plank into the ship's mess!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep16
programme.desc: The Philosophy Badge - The Squirrels think about life's big questions, helping Tino the artistic mouse escape a crisis of confidence and gaining their Philosophy badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: The Future Badge - The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot version of Duggee - and a few other interesting changes to the clubhouse too!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep14
programme.desc: The Family Photo Badge - The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family, earning their Family Photo Badges and a brilliant group picture in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Rainforests of Sumatra, Indonesia - Can the Go Jetters save the world's stinkiest plant from becoming Glitch's latest perfume?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Bonneville Salt Flats, USA - Xuli and Glitch go head to head as they try to beat the Go Jet Academy land speed record.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep19
programme.desc: Don't Bother Victor - Peter Sam arrives at the depot after shunting coal trucks all night. Thomas is there waiting to take the Thin Controller to Knapford to meet with the Fat Controller.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: Planetarium Aquarium - Sarah and Duck go to the aquarium to track down a waving fish.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep14
programme.desc: Bench Blocked - When Sarah and Duck's favourite bench is in use, the pair find other things to do in the park.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: Sand Monsters - Sand Monster Nelly and Sand Monster Nora love to knock down sand castles!

programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Fly - Gwen tells a baby bird she will teach it how to fly. The only problem is that she doesn't know how to herself!

programme.desc: The Thing That Was Funny - Bob really wants to see his funny face, so the gang go on the hunt for a dinopaw called OtherBob.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Wonder Gang Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Willow, Whyla and Wes search for facts about one of the most wondrous creatures in the creek: the platypus! Their quokka pals help them discover how the platypus uses its duckbill, and Whyla sets Wes skill-testing challenges.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep167
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Kieran makes one last plea to Alf. Irene gives Alf a piece of her mind. Justin slowly rebuilds his life.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Jamie Durie is one of our most dynamic TV personalities. He's led an interesting life that has had its challenges. Can Anh capture his charisma and passion?

programme.title: Q+A Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 15 - Giving all Australians a voice, Q+A gets to the heart of the issues that matter. Stan Grant drives the conversation with a panel of guests as the audience and general public get to ask the questions to key decision-makers.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep175
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: Friday Briefing Ep35
programme.desc: End the week on top of all the big issues in politics and national affairs. Greg Jennett is joined by a panel of journalists and commentators to discuss the big stories that dominated the news agenda.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep190
programme.desc: Bringing you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and international news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: AFLW Ep31
programme.desc: We're past the halfway mark of the AFLW regular season as Round 6 kicks off with a Friday Night doubleheader. In Game 1 from Frankston in Melbourne, the Hawthorn Hawks take on the West Coast Eagles.

programme.title: AFLW Ep32
programme.desc: For the very first time its a South Australian Derby in the AFLW as the Port Adelaide Power take on crosstown rivals the Adelaide Crows at the Adelaide Oval.

programme.title: The World Ep195
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Manny Tsigas presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Who Gets To Stay In Australia? Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - An Italian family faces being torn apart, an Irish couple fight for their son, and a man in detention makes his last desperate bid to prevent his deportation to a country he barely knows.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - With 500 people leaving Nepal daily, social entrepreneur Bina Shrestha is determined to create local opportunities, one eco-friendly brick at a time. COVID slowed her down but with Australian backing she is not giving up.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep195
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with the best coverage of the day's top stories and the latest news. Michael Tetlow brings you a complete snapshot of what's happening in the cities, suburbs and regional communities.

programme.title: The Virus Ep34
programme.desc: Your one-stop weekly program keeping you up to date with everything you need to know about COVID-19. We're entering a new phase of the pandemic, as life slowly returns to normal but COVID remains circulating in the community.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep167
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Kieran makes one last plea to Alf. Irene gives Alf a piece of her mind. Justin slowly rebuilds his life.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Sophapone Heuanglith is the face of sign language in Laos, shooting to fame when she hit back at criticism about her signing during COVID updates. Her stand is changing perceptions of people with hearing impairment.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep195
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date. Michael Tetlow presents ABC Late News from Perth, bringing you detailed coverage of the day's top stories, trusted analysis and new details on the issues and events that shaped our day.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep35
programme.desc: With cost of living pressures and interest rates rising after the pandemic, it's never been more important to keep an eye on your money. Rachel Pupazzoni and the team explain the economic impact for business and consumers.

programme.title: Q+A Highlights Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 15 - Giving all Australians a voice, Q+A gets to the heart of the issues that matter. Stan Grant drives the conversation with a panel of guests as the audience and general public get to ask the questions to key decision-makers.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep32
programme.desc: Paul Barry turns the spotlight onto those who 'make the news': the reporters, online editors, producers, camera operators and photographers, plus PR consultants, media agencies, spin-doctors, lobbyists and social influencers.

programme.title: Friday Briefing Ep35

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep4
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Dern vs. Yan
programme.desc: Prelims - With wins in five of her last six bouts, a stretch that has seen her defeat Tecia Torres and score Performance of the Night victories over Nina Nunes, Randa Markos and Hannah Cifers, Mackenzie Dern is on the verge of entering the strawweight title race, but to get there, she has to defeat China’s Yan Xiaonan in the main event of UFC Fight Night on October 1 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of wins over Angela Hill, Karolina Kowalkiewicz and Claudia Gadelha, Yan has proven to be a top contender at 115 pounds, but now she will meet her toughest test yet in the decorated jiu-jitsu black belt who is hungry to make her way to the top of the division

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Dern vs. Yan
